values.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is difficult, but eating is easier.

A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is difficult, but eating is easier. Adaptation has removed some of the difficulty with talking.
An imposing snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, making eating easier.
Big fuzzy triangles crown [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, pivoting and flicking back to every sound they sense. They're very sensitive, so please don't shout.
A wonderfully fluffy fox tail drapes from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. Was that a small wag just then?
